title: Listener Info Document
description: Stores generate information about a listener.

type.title: Document Type
type.description: Indicates that this is a listener_info document.  Should be set to 'flight'.

time_created.title: Time Created
time_created.description: An RFC3339 string containing the time this document was created.

time_uploaded.title: Time Uploaded
time_uploaded.description: An RFC3339 string containing the time this document was uploaded to the database.

data.title: Listener Data
data.description: General data about the listener. Only the callsign property is required.

callsign.title: Listener Callsign
callsign.description: A callsign for this listener. Does not hae to be an official amateur radio callsign.
